chain coif and language to dark itenerant knight.

CheffieGithub.bugfix: Fixed void corruption tick interval, it will not spread to the whole town in minutes anymore.
Fixed void corruption never getting removed(?) Because it overrode the duration tick.
Fixed void corruption not having an alert icon.
Fixed weed and spice causing error signs

CheffieGithub.code_imp: Added balloon alerts, use them instead of one off chat messages for more visible feedback.

Wouju.qol: replaced ounces with ligulae, no more dividing by 3 for reagent containers

Wouju.rscadd: Iron melting point reduced, it can now be smelted inside furnaces
More items are meltable now, spoons and forks for example

wgtjunior743.rscdel: Void Corruption from the Red Dragon

lmenvs.bugfix: fixed a bug where praying swear words to Psydon caused divine punishment

7erracotta.rscadd: Added new weapons with smithing recipes.

wgtjunior743.bugfix: Assassins beggar and servants are not foreigners anymore.

SarmentiCampbell.rscadd: Added a new type of ear to rakshari, allowing them to hear whisper from farther.

Wouju.rscadd: Repairing clothes with a needle now consumes thread at a % chance, based on your skill. Blessed needle cannot repair clothes

wgtjunior743.rscadd: Saw Dust and Stone Chippings can be cleaned like Vomit

wgtjunior743.bugfix: Only weapon intents can proc the silver effect

Wouju.rscadd: Tweaked the volume of a lot of reagent containers, shouldn't be noticeable changes
However, soups and stews now require 25 units of water instead of 33, so you can make 4 \"batches\" of stew in one full pot

Just-Sim.bugfix: Catbox not being recognized as an image host.

SarmentiCampbell.qol: Removed Moondusts, Ozium and Pure Moondust's ability to flash your screen at the start of the reagent metabolization.

7erracotta.rscadd: three new weapons and their smithing recipes

CheffieGithub.bugfix: Fixed leyline toggle verb

CheffieGithub.rscadd: Added basic prefs functionality to the prefs window, click the button in the top right. Currently supports various sound settings, be voice and maptext toggles for balloon alerts and runechat.

dwasint.rscadd: You can now use Triumphs to influence migrant waves

grungussuss.rscadd: Added the \"Silence!!\" command to the throne.

grungussuss.bugfix: the throne will no longer say you are not worthy, if you are.
key lock/unlocks show the key afterimage like they were supposed to
lying down will no longer forever displace you by 6 pixels down
biting people with an item in hand will no longer play the item_attack_animation

Telvayne.bugfix: corrected a missing # that was causing mirrors to set hair color to #000000

CheffieGithub.bugfix: Fixed all steel recipes costing 3 bars
Vanderlin keep steam vent removed

Wouju.rscadd: water arrows/bolts are now craftable by artificers

Wouju.qol: Clarified the recipe names of artificier craftable items

Wouju.balance: Crossbows now require TWO fibres instead of ONE. Vanderlin balance in shambles

snowyseshi.rscadd: Vampiric Manipulation, Vampiric charm. (encode thoughts and eoran charm but rewritten so they can use it)
Give Zizo clerics/paladins Zizo chant language
Retired Mercenary now has their cmode music and old psydonic language

grungussuss.rscadd: Your runetext chat messages now print out gradually

wgtjunior743.bugfix: Crusader Tabard overwriting the Tabard craft

SarmentiCampbell.rscadd: Added four new type of godless

grungussuss.admin: admins have a new god hand smite

Wouju.rscadd: Harpoon gun is now craftable
New sprites for iron and steel gears

Magiy-Anne.rscadd: Allows more races to be Physickers

snowyseshi.rscadd: Vampire throne room with minor manor tweaks.

snowyseshi.bugfix: Vampire manor doors not having keys assigned to them

grungussuss.admin: god hand smite actually works now

SarmentiCampbell.rscadd: Added wretches, alongside new classes, spells and such,.

CheffieGithub.bugfix: IMPORTANT: fixed toggles not being able to be saved if all options are off.

Bloo4420.rscadd: gave peddlers the ability say their currently stocked wares out loud

Bloo4420.spellcheck: corrected the two instances of max_merchanise in the file to be max_merchandise

Wouju.rscadd: Added a new peasant dye. Taraxacum Yellow
You can now write textbooks on alchemy, engineering and medicine
textbooks now have an INT requirement, they also give bonus XP based on half your INT

Wouju.qol: Some skill descriptions should be more accurate now

wgtjunior743.rscadd: Half-Elves and Half-Drows can pick their accent between humen and their respective elf half.
Half-Elves and Half-Drows that play zalad roles and have their accent set to humen will have zalad as their native tongue.
Grenzel and Zaladins foreigners now have their respective accents

wgtjunior743.code_imp: Changed how some of the accent code works

wgtjunior743.rscadd: Half-Drow can also play adventurer Qatil
Zombie and Skeleton Native Languages are Zizo Chant

CheffieGithub.bugfix: Fixed ultimate sacrifice buttons

Wouju.rscadd: Blacksmiths can craft bronze gears
Crafting iron gears gives 2 gears now

flleeppyy.server: SSplexora now actually sends the serverstart request, roundnotify should work now

Wouju.rscadd: Archivists can now be Zizo worshippers.
Gave zizo chant to zizo mages, court mages, rogue mages (whom are basically already zizoites) and archivists

Wouju.balance: making stuff from clay requires crafting now instead of masonry

Wouju.rscadd: Steamknight armour is now craftable

Wouju.balance: Steamknight armour now requires skilled in engineering to be properly utilized

Wouju.rscadd: Adults can now be squires. You should probably roleplay them as more like young adults/teenagers however, because they get a bit less stats than normal adults for reasons.

Wouju.balance: steam knight no longer gets a stat malus, instead they get a skill malus

7erracotta.rscadd: Added new valuable items and smithing recipes.

wgtjunior743.bugfix: Aspirant that picks the gun option now has gun skills ammo and gunpowder.
Aspirant that picks the bomb option can make bombs.

wgtjunior743.admin: New Admin verb to disable Triumph Buys

CheffieGithub.bugfix: Fixed cooking stews in pots
Fixed new wooden fence and pallisade passing.
Fixed harpies sometimes not having wings or the correct tail
Fixed punches being unable to do critical hits or wounds
Round end vote passing stops futher votes from happening.

grungussuss.admin: subtle messages are more visible to the player

Wouju.rscadd: Buckets can hold fish and fishing related bait, cups can hold tiny items
Buckets transfer 10 units instead of 9
angler and clownfish taste improved, they are still quite crap for nobles (except clownfish, they are fine)
Added craftable dice cups and dice

Bloo4420.rscadd: Craftable wicker handbaskets with unique content sprites

Bloo4420.code_imp: changed 3 instances of (things.len) in bags.dm to instead be (length(things)) to be in line with other code.

DrSirKnight.rscadd: Two new wretch subclasses, Rouschild and Rejected Royal

Just-Sim.rscadd: A headshot miniature, if you possess one.

dwasint.rscadd: composters can now be clicked on with a shovel to bulk remove compost

CheffieGithub.bugfix: Fixed biting applying limb damage twice.

CheffieGithub.balance: You can bite head sub zones except cranium, hands, feet and groin to do biting crits or have strong bite. Assuming your bite does more than 10 damage.

snowyseshi.rscadd: watch boots with a special footstep noise + change footman cudgel to iron mace

grungussuss.bugfix: fixed runechat being cancelled on minor damage

KittyNoodle.code_imp: Removes some very unintentional (hopefully) stuff added to the codebase. Move along citizen.

Arkatos.bugfix: Secret officiant now works correctly for non clergy also, and triumph buy cost was decreased by 1.

snowyseshi.code_imp: added new variables for VL assignement.

Fixed twist not causing dislocations or fractures

CheffieGithub.bugfix: Fix infinite stress events

Wouju.rscadd: Heads are now guaranteed when butchering
You can butcher heads with MMB and a knife to get extra meats

wgtjunior743.bugfix: Prevents the Tome sleep bug from happening.
Crusaders from Crusader Wave not getting their grenzel accent

CheffieGithub.rscadd: Converted various things to balloon alerts for readability.
Re-added reagent container transfer amount changing. Shift left/right click to \"scroll\" the transfer amounts, report containers with only one option.

grungussuss.admin: admins can now disable particle weather.

Fixed reagent cycling conflicts, its now alt

Wouju.bugfix: fixed ingot molds not needing to reharden metal after the first harden-ing

Wouju.balance: adepts no longer have church key

Wouju.rscadd: Abyssorites and Pestrans can summon leeches now.

Wouju.balance: tweaked cost and cooldown of cure rot and bodypart miracle. Bodypart miracle now heals limbs and organs when reattached.

wgtjunior743.rscadd: Silver Amulet can also protect you from the WW infection

coifs have proper armour classes now
renegade collar requires hide to craft
coif, etc. items are smeltable now

lmenvs.rscadd: Adds the hygiene system.  You will now need to bathe, you filthy animal.
Certain perfumes are now craftable by the apothecary.  Perfume increases hygiene.
New Be Special and Trait for those who like to get down with they funky smellin' self.
Harpies have a new preen emote that will increase hygiene with a long cooldown. Harpies who successfully preen their feathers have a chance to drop a feather on the ground.
Eora's miracle, Instill Perfection, will also increase hygiene now.

wgtjunior743.bugfix: Not being able to craft the Hardened leather coat
Abyssal and Sword Dancer mercs spawning without their keys.
All godless types counts toward Apostasy at the round end.

SarmentiCampbell.rscadd: Added Porter, A mercenary Class for Kobold

Just-Sim.rscadd: OOC Notes, OOC Extra, Flavor Text Markdown

lmenvs.config: adds configuration for death via starvation/dehydration. not on by default

7erracotta.rscadd: Added some armor and cloaks for the merc class to waer

Wouju.rscadd: Added City Watch Lieutenant

Wouju.map: added city watch lieutenant's room and office, tweaked the city watch garrison a bit

Wouju.rscadd: Mages can pick their hats and robes upon spawning in.

wgtjunior743.bugfix: Harpoon consuming steam when it is not being used.
Harpoon being able to remove all the steam from the steamknight boiler.
Steamknight being skilled if they picked saber, they are not expert.
Steamknight still being expert on crossbow.
Tieflings, Hollow-kin and medicators being able to play noble as prisoner.
Magician Apprentices are properly locked to Noc and Zizo.

Wouju.rscadd: You can see someone's constitution and speed, on examine. if you have high enough perception

Wouju.qol: backpacks, coifs and gorgets/bevors can't be pickpocketed. Those are strapped on too tight. Made no sense you could take off someones coif to be honest.
general improvements to pickpocketing, like the target's pickpocketing skill mattering

Wouju.balance: backpacks, coifs and gorgets/bevors can't be pickpocketed. Those are strapped on too tight. Made no sense you could take off someones coif to be honest.
you can aim for a specific back/belt slot by aiming for the targets arms/legs

wgtjunior743.bugfix: Sallet beings unforgeable.
